Author: TonyL#3577
Content: `Is there an atomic swap explorer that we can review the swap id, maker id and taker id` there is no such explorer at the moment, it's possible to check information about your swap (from your side) in logs (and logs possible to get by `Settings -> Send feedback` feature)

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Dear testers, please `do not swap RVN until the next AtomicDEX update`.
RVN electrum servers which using in at the moment in the app very unstable, what causing almost all RVN swaps fails. 
We already prepared own RVN electrums infrastructure and it's under testing at the moment so in next release we'll have stable ones ü§û

Author: Mr. Orange#4717
Content: Hello.  I have some feed back on the mobile DEX.  Very good so far.  I have done 11 swaps.  6 Timeout failures.  For some reason, the tactile feedback on entering my pin could be more sensitive.  For the 6 number password, it often only registers 5 numbers. Not sure why, but it happens more often than not.  Also, when a atomic swap fails, it would be better to have the error message stay up until you confirm OK.  Many times I am trying to read the error message but it dissapears before I finish reading it.  Overall, the mobile DEX is impressive and I am excited for Komodo's future.  Keep up the great work. üëå (I just realized I posted this is the wrong section, earlier...my apologizes)
